==== await_unaryExpression_es6.ts (0 errors) ====
    async function bar() {
        !await 42; // OK
    }
    
    async function bar1() {
        +await 42; // OK
    }
    
    async function bar3() {
        -await 42; // OK
    }
    
    async function bar4() {
        ~await 42; // OK
    }
